mapper.insert: insert into message ( fromid, toid. content, conversation_id, created_date ) values ( #{fromid}, #{toid}, #{content}, #{conversation_id}, #{created_date} )
mapper.update: update message set fromid = #{fromid}, toid = #{toid}, content = #{content}, conversation_id = #{conversation_id}, created_date = #{created_date} where id=#{id}
